name: mediamanager
description: MediaManager is a media collection organizer and categorizer. It provides a web interface to upload, tag, group, and browse files such as images, videos, and documents in a self-hosted environment.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload images, videos, and documents through drag-and-drop or file browser

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Apply custom tags to files for flexible categorization and filtering

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Group media into categories and subcategories for structured browsing

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find files quickly by name, tags, or metadata using full-text search

features.title: Metadata Editing
features.description: Add descriptions, titles, and custom fields to files for better organization

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Set permissions to control who can view, upload, or modify files
